name: Timed
desc: A full stack app for Pomodoro timer, countdown timer and a stopwatch timer. Backend rest api made with Nodejs, Express js, Mongoose and Mongodb. Frontend made with React js, Redux and CSS

name: Ryu Discord Bot
desc: Discord bot made using the discord api and sqllite. Adds functionality for admin commands, basic economy, and user leveling

name: Portfolo Site
desc: Portfolio site created using React Js, where I showcase my projects.
